header.description: A Vanilla RTX addon that makes Jack'o'Lanterns have same light effect with non-RTX environment. Place above Vanilla RTX.
header.description_zh_cn: 让南瓜灯光效符合非RTX环境的Vanilla RTX附加组件，把该材质包放在Vanilla RTX的上面以生效。
header.name: Lit pumpkin mod for Vanilla RTX
header.name_zh_cn: 适用于Vanilla RTX的南瓜灯光效Mod
